descriptor.long_desc: True HD Sound : 10 mm Earphone Drivers provide Crystal clear, Top audio performance with driving bass, Crystal Clear Vocals and precision treble response for music you can feelSuper Bass & Strong Treble : Deep, rich sound across a wide frequency range, enhanced by a sealed acoustic design for better immersion in your musicSweat-proof & Durable : Designed to be out and about, 3.5mm angled stereo connector design provides extra durability.Comfortable Snug Fit : Ergonomic design provides comfortable Snug fit, keeps the ear buds steady in your ears without falling out. Don’t hurt ears even after long wearingIn-Built Microphone & In-line Volume Control for hands-free talking & volume adjustment, With L Shape connector for ease of using

Infinite display | Experience brilliance on your wrist with an almost bezel-less full touch curved screenBluetooth Calling: Answer and make calls with Bluetooth directly from your watch. Call, Message & Social Media Notification, AI Voice Assistant (Google & Siri)Blood Oxygen Level: The Pebble Frost Pro comes with a blood oxygen level sensor that can help you monitor your oxygen saturation level and provide insights into your overall health and well-being.Heart Rate Monitoring: The watch also has a heart rate monitor that can help you track your heart rate and provide alerts if it detects any abnormalities.Multi-Sports Mode: The Pebble Frost Pro supports multiple sports modes, including running, cycling, swimming, and more. This allows you to track your workouts and get insights into your performance.Multiple Color Options: The different color options in Pebble Frost Pro allows you to express your style and personality in a fun and unique way, making your smartwatch truly yours.

descriptor.long_desc: Get your hands on a Pebble Frost smartwatch to manage your everyday activities and enhance your levels of fitness with ease. The Pebble Frost smartwatch has a 4.74 cm (1.87) narrow bezel IPS full touch screen curved display that accentuates your style and fits well on your wrist. The rotating crown on this smartwatch also makes it easy to move among the applications and offers you quick access to everything you require. Additionally, you can effortlessly view recent contacts and make calls using this smartwatch's potent Bluetooth calling feature with the help of the excellent dial screen included inside the device. Moreover, this watch offers a variety of sports modes that can be used to plan out your training routine and keep track of all your physical activities.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: SRK Powertech Pvt. Ltd. G-201, Sec-63, Noida, UP- 201305
